properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 5 at 8:25PM CST until February 7 at 8:22AM CST by NWS Nashville TN
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a Flood Advisory for the
following rivers in Middle Tennessee...

Elk River Near Pelham affecting Grundy County

. Heavy rainfall has caused rises on area creeks and rivers, and should continue
over the next few days.

The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a
* Flood Advisory for
The Elk River Near Pelham
* At 8 PM Wednesday the stage was 11.1 feet.
* Action stage is 11.0 feet.
* Flood stage is 14.0 feet.
* At 11.0 feet...Water begins to inundate low lying wooded and agricultural
areas along the river.
properties.instruction:
Stay tuned to NOAA weather radio or other local media for further information
from the National Weather Service.
